member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_ALPHA_BLENDING
member.summary: Specifies alpha blending parameters for video processing. Used by the [D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_INPUT_STREAM_ARGUMENTS]ns-d3d12video-d3d12_video_process_input_stream_arguments) structure.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_ALPHA_BLENDING.Enable
member.summary: A boolean value specifying whether alpha blending is enabled.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_ALPHA_BLENDING.Alpha
member.summary: The planar alpha value. The value can range from 0.0 (transparent) to 1.0 (opaque). If Enable is FALSe, this parameter is ignored.
